title: kanikaramu lEka
sahitya:
kanikaramu lEkapOyE nAmIta nIku


anupallavi

  vanajAkSA ninnu nammina vADani isumanta nIku


caraNam 1    panikirAni vArivalla bAta paTuTa telisi nIvu kanusaikanu bilaci nannu kAcEda nani balka nIku
    caraNam 2    sarivAralu navvErani cAla nItO morapeTTaka verevakumani vEgamE kramupaTTi tiTavu ceppaka
    caraNam 3    nI pAdamulE gatiyani-yEproddunu bhajincina gOpAladAsuni madi kodava dIrcci brOva nIku
